definition: to change or replace/to experience/one of the five two-hour periods into which the night was formerly divided/watch (e.g. of a sentry or guard)
first month of the lunar year
straight/upright/proper/main/principal/to correct/to rectify/exactly/just (at that time)/right (in that place)/(math.) positive

sentences.english: Run the Database Wizard and re-link the shape to correct the problem.
sentences.chinese: 運行“數據庫嚮導”並重新鏈接形狀以更正此問題。

sentences.english: In practice, these corrections are rarely required.
sentences.chinese: 在實踐中，很少需要作出這些更正。

sentences.english: The Council for Trade in Services shall establish procedures for rectification or modification of Schedules .
sentences.chinese: 服務貿易理事會應爲更正或修改減讓表制定程序。
維基百科，我理解，歡迎更正。

sentences.english: You can come in and have your grades adjusted.
sentences.chinese: 你可以來我這更正你的成績。

sentences.english: Unable to add entry to AutoCorrect because there is insufficient memory.
sentences.chinese: 內存不足，無法添加自動更正詞條。

sentences.english: The user attempts to correct the errors and resubmits.
sentences.chinese: 用戶試圖更正錯誤並重新提交。
儘早的發現和更正問題。

sentences.english: Maybe there's a better and more semantically correct way to do your markup.
sentences.chinese: 也許還有一個更好，並更多語義更正您的標記的方法。

sentences.english: Corrected wall blocker issue in the Hubologist base.
sentences.chinese: 在Hubologist更正牆基攔截器的問題。

sentences.english: If you want to use the direct cursor, then disable the AutoCorrect tool.
sentences.chinese: 如果要使用直接定位光標，則需要禁用自動更正工具。

sentences.english: The correction in writing forms a part of the arbitral award.
sentences.chinese: 該書面更正構成裁決書的一部分。

sentences.english: Complainants have the right to request access to and correction of their personal data submitted for this complaint.
sentences.chinese: 投訴人有權要求查閱及更正所提交的個人資料。

sentences.english: The market can correct some of these problems.
sentences.chinese: 市場可以自行更正其中的一些問題。

sentences.english: To read(copy or proof) in order to find errors and mark corrections.
sentences.chinese: 爲發現錯誤和做出更正而閱讀校樣的人。

sentences.english: This autocorrect entry does not exist.
sentences.chinese: 此自動更正詞條不存在。

definition: to point out mistakes or weak points for correction/to comment/criticism
a slip of a pen/CL:處|处[chu4]
to correct/to amend/to put right/correction/CL:個|个[ge4]
to supply again (sth lost)/to reissue/to pay retroactively
